replies.body: GET REKT
The only comment i have about her, is that when she is burrowed her health bar should not be shown. Make is so you have to notice the "fin" not just the giant floating health bar above her head
I agree, the health bar almost ruins the general affect of her being less visible, or at least make her invisible on the mini-map. Wards can't see underground.....

I think it would be cool if her health bar would only show on her burrowed form if she is attacked, like how hitting a stealthed enemy reveals them. This way, she can still be less noticeable while burrowed but allow some counter-play.

If you hide her health bar while burrowed, she becomes borderline broken. She could still gank effectively with minuscule amounts of HP and force flashes and much more cautious play out of laners when any other jungler would just get themselves killed. There's been a push for clarity and counterplay in League, not a lack of it, and something like that just is so unclear and uncounterable (because what if she IS at full health? are you going to 100-0 her?) that it really wouldn't work.
Have you ever heard of {{champion:35}}?

No i think this person is trying to say that, while shaco is invisible, you obviously wouldn't go in and gank, when with this new champ, you could just show up at lane even with no health and still scare the enemy into backing off because they would have no clue if your full health or empty

Rek'Sai: Oh hey top enemy top laner! Imma just leave this tunnel here while I'm level 5 and then I'm going to bank another lane...maybe. Don't try any funny business while I'm killing you teammates.
{{champion:75}} : Fine then, I'll just follow you down there with teleport.
Rek'sai: Oops! Looks like I blew your teleport and jumped back top and got two turrets with all my attack speed! So sorry man. 
{{champion:75}} : I feel like void champions are made to annoy me. 
Rek'Sai: I would buy you a drink, but I already have plans with {{champion:90}} , He and I share a past from when he looked into the void. (hint, hint Rito)
>Implying Frito gives a damn about lore anymore

Seriously. Does anyone else remember the lore update they pushed out with the Shurima event? The one that replaced Ezreal's, Amumu's, and many more lore pages with a couple sentences that looked like something out of a lazy 6th grader's essay. {{item:3070}}

And Ezweal became teh bestest explorer in all the sands, the end.

Good job Riot!

At least the new Champion looks amazing..
Starcraft Lurker?
I'm amazed they made a female void champion, and there aren't any tits hanging on her. Good job Riot!
So true, this might be because she's not exactly a human... she has no tits?
{{champion:267}}
.... Is a mermaid... (like, with the top half of a human)
Yorick, the ultimate counter digs her up {{champion:83}}

GUYS WATCH OUT
IT'S THE 
ALASKAN
BULL
WORM
I aint afraid of no Alaskan bull worm im from texas
Shark skin would be nice, maybe a Jaws theme song when she burrows?
Street sharks
That's a jawesome idea.
I was thinking more along the lines of a Tremors worm skin.

{{champion:31}} Hello wife!
{{champion:72}} Nope, she's mine!
{{champion:38}} That's my daughter!
{{champion:121}} Is she consumable!
{{champion:31}} You'd better believe she is!
If that is a "she" THEN WHAT THE HELL DOES A "HIM" LOOK LIKE?!?!

Most animal kingdom women are bigger than the male. The queen ant. The queen bee. A female spider is like 10x bigger than the male, and once the male impregnates the female, the female spider eats the male. The female lion does the hunting while the male just sits around. My guess is the female is way more bad ass than the male.
also the male anglerfish is the biggest wimp ever, while the female is the classic massive jaws of death with a lantern.
{{champion:64}} i cant tell the difference
Just noticed...if void females are larger than void males, then what is a female {{champion:31}}  size?
{{champion:4}} Beast please. I've popping outta no where since this show began.

Yeah but you have a Lame Teleport. She just flies.

Underground.
she doesnt fly she diggs.
what is digging, but flying in dirt.
If she doesn't have a special animation around the Scuttle Crab, I'm gonna throw a hissy fit.

So Kalista {{champion:429}} is a gateway champion for ADC, teaching people how to move after each attack, and Rek'Sai is a gateway champion for junglers, teaching counter jungling? I'm okay with this.
{{champion:20}} was definitely the gateway champion for counter jungling
It's Lee Sin's mom. I'm always 99% correct.{{champion:64}}
Considering she's female... that 1% is biting you in the rear.

This is a pretty creative champion.
11/10

{{champion:40}} Viability Forecast:

Starts off rocky with a round of buffs in the right places and subsequential nerfs in the wrong places.

Will move on to prime viability and be nerfed yet again.

Then will move down the ladder and be scrapped in the balance department until the impending "mega-tweak" that solidifies her role.
Wouldn't it be fitting for a tunneling champion to be nerfed into the ground?
It's Cho'Gath's Mother...{{champion:31}} {{summoner:12}} {{item:2045}}
Omg, Your my mother. I have finally found you. (Swiss and Swizzy) ._. This is unbelievable LOL

{{champion:121}} Hey Malz you cant leave this void ooze laying around I almost stepped in it...
{{champion:90}} Oh sorry Kha my bad ill clean it up in a few minutes.

ONE HOUR LATER

{{champion:121}} (yells form the other room) "HEY MALZ REMEMBER WHEN I TOLD YOU I WAS GONNA PUT MY PET WORM Patrick IN THE BOX I WAS KEEPING MY PET HAMPSTER IN?? (enters room) well they got out!"

**SPLASH**

{{champion:121}} "I TOLD YOU TO CLEAN THIS MESS UP!"

{{champion:90}} "OOOPS" 

{{champion:121}} "Whats this trail coming from the ooze leading to Cho's house"

{{champion:31}} "WTF guys something just dug a hole through my back yard... my pool is just gone! You guys are gonna pay for this...this is worse than that time malz and {{champion:38}}  got in that drunken brawl on my back porch"

*Blood Boiling Scream and a huge Explosion outside..*

{{champion:90}}  " What was that lets go check it out!"

(the group walks outside to catch a glimpse of the culprit)

{{champion:121}} *Looks up*  "..........Patrick?!?"

Another highly mobile champion with a knockup to help make {{champion:157}} an even greater pain in the ass? Oh Rito, you shouldn't have!

No really. *You shouldn't have.*

YUSH! Female void creature, love it!
And dat ulti sound, pubs are gonna be so fun!

This seems like an extremely difficult champ to master, but my word, the results that you will achieve. These past couple champs have been really unique in terms of gameplay. I look forward to trying her out!!
